name: main
description: Main cookbook for NewSpring Cloud Servers
long_description:
Description
===========

A very simple set of recipes that will help configure a Rackspace cloud server running 10.04. 

More to come...

Requirements
============

Attributes
==========

Usage
=====

It's best to just include recipes in roles or specified in a run list.

rightscale/public_key.description: Public Key to simplify logging in

hipchat/token.description: Notification token to the HipChat API

hipchat/room.description: The room that should receive the report

hipchat/notify.description: Should the notification notify all users?

recipes.main::do_apache_configure: Disables default site and sets up ports
recipes.main::do_hipchat_lb_added: Notifcation that instance was added to Load Balancer
recipes.main::do_hipchat_lb_removed: Notification was removed from the Load Balancer
recipes.main::do_memcache_setup: Adds the private IP to the config.php file
recipes.main::do_memcache_update: Updates the private IP to the config.php file incase the memcache server needs to be relaunched
recipes.main::do_hipchat_start_notify: Notify Apollos that setup has started
